hero.title: Logistics solutions for Food and Beverages
hero.description: We move your supply chain with safety, traceability and sanitary compliance.

intro.text: We guarantee the quality, safety and freshness of your products from raw material to point of sale. At Yobel we integrate manufacturing, warehousing, transportation and distribution under the highest BPM/BPA standards.

items.title: Manufacturing
items.description: We process, package and recondition food and beverage products under sanitary control, complying with safety and batch traceability standards.

items.title: Cold Storage
items.description: We have refrigeration, sanitary quarantine and advanced WMS zones for real-time cold chain monitoring.

items.title: Value-Added Services (VAS)
items.description: Repackaging, nutritional labeling, pack assembly and promotions with batch control and auditing.

items.title: Distribution
items.description: Optimized routes for perishable products, with scheduled B2B and B2C deliveries nationwide, ensuring product integrity.

items.title: Foreign Trade
items.description: Comprehensive import/export management, customs procedures and nationalization of raw materials and finished products.

benefits.title: We focus on optimizing time and traceability
items: Reduced spoilage in transportation and storage.
Flexibility for seasonal peaks or promotions.

items.title: Seasonal launches
items.fullDesc: Kitting and national distribution for new lines or promotions.

items.title: Sanitary relabeling
items.fullDesc: Label adaptation according to local regulations or channel.

items.title: Promotions and packs
items.fullDesc: Combo assembly with batch control and validity time.

items.title: Retail replenishment
items.fullDesc: Scheduled deliveries to supermarkets, wholesalers and pharmacies.

items.title: Returns management
items.fullDesc: Control processes and safe disposal of non-standard products.

certificates.description: We have international certifications that guarantee operational excellence and food safety.
